name: crowdbotics
description: `Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))` ## Install minikube `choco install minikube` ## Start cluster `minikube start` ## Validate cluster `minikube status` `kubectl cluster-info`
